description: Increased risk of liver damage due to combined hepatotoxic effects.
Can enhance anticoagulant effect increasing bleeding risk.
Competes for COX-1 receptors reducing aspirin cardioprotective effect.
Increased stomach ulcer and bleeding risk.
May increase risk of lactic acidosis especially in renal impairment.
Can reduce drug clearance leading to toxicity.
Increases atorvastatin levels causing muscle toxicity (rhabdomyolysis).
Inhibits metabolism leading to higher statin levels.
Reduces activation of clopidogrel lowering antiplatelet effect.
Decreases antibiotic absorption leading to treatment failure.
